case.title: The user can use the "search" option to search for articles on the site

custom.preconds: The user is on the homepage.

step.content: The user clicks on the magnifying glass button.
step.expected: A text box appears for entering a search term.

step.content: The user enters the search term in the text field.
step.expected: The entered phrase appears in the text box.
Articles containing the search term appear on the page.

case.title: The user can open the article on the page

custom.preconds: The user is on the homepage.

step.content: The user clicks on the title of the article on the page.
step.expected: The user is redirected to the page containing the content of the article.

case.title: The user can view the next article using the "Next post" option

custom.preconds: The user is on an article page

step.content: The user presses the "Next post" button.
step.expected: The user is redirected to the page containing the next article.

case.title: The user can view the previous article using the "previous post" option

custom.preconds: The user is on an article page

step.content: The user presses the "previous post" button
step.expected: The user is redirected to the page with the previous article.

case.title: The user can leave a comment under the article

custom.preconds: The user is on the article page.

step.content: The user fills in the mandatory fields (comment, name, email).
The user presses the 'publish comment' button.
step.expected: The comment is added and displayed below the article.

case.title: The user can open the "More" tab

custom.preconds: The user is on the homepage.

step.content: The user clicks on the "..." icon.

step.expected: The user is redirected to the page's Twitter account.

case.title: The user can search for articles using the search engine in the "more" section
